content: The Macaque Chief is a required and recurring Yaoguai Chief miniboss fight that you can encounter multiple times in Chapter 3 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in both the Snowhill Path, Pagoda Realm and Thunderclap Temple, this tricky opponent is hard to pin down.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Macaque_Chief.md', within the main section titled 'Macaque Chief'.
The content is as follows:
The Macaque Chief is a required and recurring Yaoguai Chief miniboss fight that you can encounter multiple times in Chapter 3 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in both the Snowhill Path, Pagoda Realm and Thunderclap Temple, this tricky opponent is hard to pin down.
